name: TextFormattingCommands
desc: A built-in set of commands for transforming the styles applied to selections of text.

items.name: init()
items.desc: A new value describing the built-in text-formatting commands.

items.name: var body: some Commands
items.desc: The contents of the command hierarchy.

items.name: typealias Body
items.desc: The type of commands that represents the body of this command hierarchy.
